servinfo.title: Parking Brake Cable Removal and Installation

attention3.ptxt: When it is necessary to remove both right and left parking brake cables, repeat the following steps 4) to 5) on right and left wheels.

s1.ptxt: Hoist vehicle and remove rear wheel.
Disconnect parking brake cable from equalizer (parking brake lever) and clamps.
Disconnect parking brake cable from brake shoe lever.
Remove parking brake cable and parking cable bracket.

servinfosub.title: Installation
servinfosub.ptxt: Install it by reversing removal procedure, noting the following points.

item.ptxt: Tighten bolts and nuts to specified torque.
Check rear brake for dragging and brake system for proper performance. Brake test should be performed.
